original_title: All party leaders requested to submit their proposals on 13A
original_body_lines: All party leaders have been requested to submit their proposals and suggestions regarding the 13th Amendment to the Constitution on or before August 15, President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
The request has been made by the President's Secretary, as agreed during an all-party conference, which took place under the patronage of President Ranil Wickremesinghe on July 26.
